Posts.Content: Hello - reading your post could almost be word for word what happened to me (43 year old mum of two, lumpectomy etc) however I must be a week or so behind you as I’m still waiting for post op results (28th). I’m trying not to worry but the surgeon has already said he’s concerned about the margins being clear due to the location of the tumour. It’s been really helpful though reading the replies which explains it all better so thank you. I too will be considering mastectomy if this hasn’t worked. Hope all goes well and try and enjoy Christmas- I don’t know about you but it’s all just been a big blur so far but I’m trying for the sake of the children - just feel so guilty getting this and the worry it causes, especially at this time of year! Take care.Â
Posts.Title: Confused about post op results
